faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Discover how Declair works and what it can do for you.
faq.answer_1: Declair is an online declaration processing platform that helps companies submit and manage declarations.
faq.question_2: How long does it take for my declaration to be approved?
faq.answer_2: This depends on the approver, but most declarations are approved within 24 hours. For more complex declarations, this may take up to 48 hours.
faq.question_3: Are there costs associated with using Declair?
faq.answer_3: Our Starter plan costs €19 per month. For more volume and advanced features, we have paid plans starting from €39 per month.
faq.question_4: Is my data safe with Declair?
faq.answer_4: Yes, we take privacy and security very seriously. All your data is encrypted and we are fully GDPR-compliant.
faq.question_5: Can I integrate Declair with my existing accounting system?
faq.answer_5: Yes, Declair integrates with most popular accounting systems such as Exact, Moneybird, and more via our API.
faq.question_6: What kind of declarations can I submit?
faq.answer_6: You can declare all business expenses such as travel expenses, meals, office supplies, and more.
